*div1 type="summary"* *p*Aylett C. Buckner to Austin, July 2, 1831. People are gathering for marriages and christenings by Father Muldoon.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bay Praria*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="07-02-1831">2nd July 1831*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr Col°*/p*
*p*Agreeable to your request I have informed the *person_mentioned*people */person_mentioned*of your cuming with the *person_mentioned*Priest */person_mentioned*to christen and marry them I am informed there will be numbers who will collect at *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Mrs Williams*/person_mentioned* */location_mentioned*for that purpose for they are now making preparations against your arrival*/p*
*p*You will do me the pleasure to call I shall try to make things as agreeable to you and*person_mentioned* Mr. Balodon [Father Muldoon]*/person_mentioned* as possible*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Ay. C Buckner */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
